about_the_game:
.

Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women exercising dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity at Femdom Game World.



Story:

The main character, a student named Dave, is betting with his friends that he will get their young female teacher, Stacy, into bed within a month. Among other things, he himself does not mind to have fun with a beautiful girl. Only Stacy is not so simple: she likes to dominate and dominate in sexual relationships. It's scary to imagine what will happen if she finds out about the dispute between the three students....

Every choice you make affects the development of the plot and the fate of the characters, revealing new twists and consequences. Your decisions can lead to different endings, making each playthrough unique.



Key Features:

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains bondage and BDSM. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Femdom Game World: Stacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Femdom Game World: Stacy is a visual novel with a deep plot, designed for an adult audience. Finding yourself in the role of a student, you will have to win a bet: to seduce your pretty teacher. But who would have thought that the young teacher will turn out to be a strict and ruthless Mistress?
